articles.author: Victoria Song
articles.title: The Safety Check feature in iOS 16 is intended to aid those in abusive relationships - The Verge
articles.description: Apple announced Safety Check, a new iOS 16 feature that’s meant to be helpful for people who may be in an abusive relationship. It allows you to monitor who can access your devices, as well as end access across iCloud devices.
articles.content:
The feature will let you audit who has permission to your passwords and apps and cut it off at a moments notice
Screenshot: The Verge
